snippet.title: MIND: Path to Thalamus Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy this game now: http://store.steampowered.com/app/296070/

MIND: A Path to Thalamus is a First Person Puzzler that throws you into a fantastic, surreal environment. You will bend the natural elements to your will in order to progress in this emotive, mindbending tale. Coming third quarter 2014

Music by http://chriszabriskie.com/

Voice by Greg Nugent: Greg Nugent has lent his voice to numerous radioplays, animations, and video games across the internet. When not busy voice acting, Greg has tried his hand at film acting and attempting to take over the world (more on that later). Some of his roles include David Jason from The Curse of Blackwater, Gabriel from the radioplay series Dreamcatcher, and Stephen Novus from Shattered Heaven.

Feel free to check out his website at www.gregnugentva.com!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/MindVideogame

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mindvideogame
